txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>

'Most of our food comes from the farms just to the north of here, but that supply is being gravely threatened. A pack of Warg-riders has been rampaging through the fields, destroying our crops and threatening our much-needed food.\n\n'Head out into the farms of the Sutcrofts and drive these goblins and their Wargs from our fields.'
'Dinner has been saved.\n\n'I know not what tomorrow will bring but I know that we will greet it with full stomachs.'
'Are you ready to join the battle with the Enemy at the farms of the Sutcrofts?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
Goblin-riders are riding through the farms of the Sutcrofts, destroying needed food and crops.
Defeated Warg-riders at the farms of the Sutcrofts ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Warg-riders at the farms of the Sutcrofts ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Warg-riders can be found at the farms of the Sutcrofts.\n\nDaggaric asked you to head to the farms of the Sutcrofts and defeat the Warg-riders rampaging through the fields.
Daggaric is at Snowbourn.\n\nDaggaric will be pleased to hear that many of the Warg-riders have been driven from the farms of the Sutcrofts.
